children.name:
AssertionError: None of the units are upgraded
assert '+testupgrade' in 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:22:07Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     160  10.152.183.124  no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.154  no       waiting for units to settle down
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   46  10.152.183.116  no       Last written value=28342

Unit                 Workload  Agent  Address     Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active    idle   10.1.33.13         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active    idle   10.1.33.9          Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+c5db3af
mysql-router-k8s/1   active    idle   10.1.33.11         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+c5db3af
mysql-router-k8s/2*  blocked   idle   10.1.33.14         Upgrade incompatible. Rollback to previous revision with `juju refresh`
mysql-test-app/0*    active    idle   10.1.33.8          Last written value=28342
'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:22:07Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     160  10.152.183.124  no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.154  no       waiting for units to settle down
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   46  10.152.183.116  no       Last written value=28342

Unit                 Workload  Agent  Address     Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active    idle   10.1.33.13         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active    idle   10.1.33.9          Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+c5db3af
mysql-router-k8s/1   active    idle   10.1.33.11         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+c5db3af
mysql-router-k8s/2*  blocked   idle   10.1.33.14         Upgrade incompatible. Rollback to previous revision with `juju refresh`
mysql-test-app/0*    active    idle   10.1.33.8          Last written value=28342
' = get_juju_status('test')
 +    where 'test' = <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f6686542860>.name
 +      where <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f6686542860> = <pytest_operator.plugin.OpsTest object at 0x7f6685c1b880>.model

AssertionError: Expected mysqlrouter certificate from self-signed-certificates
assert 'CN = Test CA' in '        Issuer: CN = MySQL_Router_Auto_Generated_CA_Certificate\n'
